location.label: D_A'== theta_A*Dp_A-gamma_A*D_A*A && D_R'== theta_R*Dp_R-gamma_R*D_R*A && Dp_A'== gamma_A*D_A*A-theta_A*Dp_A && Dp_R'== gamma_R*D_R*A-theta_R*Dp_R && M_A'== alphap_A*Dp_A+alpha_A*D_A-delta_MA*M_A && A'== beta_A*M_A+theta_A*D_A+theta_R*Dp_R -A*(gamma_A*D_A+gamma_R*D_R+gamma_C*R+delta_A) && M_R'== alphap_R*Dp_R+alpha_R*D_R-delta_MR*M_R && R'== beta_R*M_R-gamma_C*A*R+delta_A*C-delta_R*R && C'== gamma_C*A*R-delta_A*C

query.comment: Periodic oscilations of A, R and C concentrations over 100 hours = ~4 days

query.formula: simulate [<=100] { D_A, Dp_A, D_R, Dp_R, M_A, A, R, M_R, C }
